# Base exclusion patterns - common to ALL Idris2 versions
# Format: one pattern per line, prefix* for prefix matching

# Compiler-generated MN names
{csegen:*}
{eta:*}
{arg:*}
{lazyArg:*}

# Builtins and primitives
_builtin.*
prim__*

# Standard library modules
Prelude.*
Data.*
System.*
Control.*
Decidable.*
Language.*
Debug.*

# Type constructors (auto-generated ADT case trees)
# These end with '.' - handled specially in code
